basisSet.dc:title: aug-cc-pVTZ-DK
basisSet.dct:abstract: VTZ2P All-electron Douglas-Kroll Valence Triple Zeta + Polarization
basisSet.dc:description:
All-electron, Douglas-Kroll Transition Metal aug-cc-pVTZ-DK Basis Sets ---------------------------------------------------------------------- Elements Contraction References Sc - Zn: (21s,17p,9d,3f,2g) -> [8s,7p,5d,3f,2g] N.B. Balabanov and K.A. Peterson, J. Chem. Phys., 123, 064107 (2005)
Note: a finite nuclear model was not used in the development of these basis sets. Therefore, they may have to be recontracted for use in Gaussian03.
